title: WTB: T206 SGC Graded Cards UPDATED LIST!
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 SGC Graded Cards UPDATED LIST!
posts.post_content:
Hi. I am looking for the following players in SGC graded 40-60 ONLY (I would prefer 50's if possible). Please no creases on the 40's. 
Mike Powers, Chief Meyers (portrait), Bill Dahlen, Doc White (pitching), Jiggs Donohue, Billy Payne, Jim Scott, Fred Parent, Fielder Jones (hands on hips), Lou Feine (both), Simon Nicholls (hands on knees), Neal Ball, Bob Ganley, Harry Niles, Larry Doyle (throwing), Geo. Gibson, Frank Bowerman, Buck Herzog (Boston), John Hummel, Red Ames (portrait), Johnny Bates, Fred Tenney, Tim Jordan (portrait), Red Ames (hands at chest), Red Murray (batting) & Harry Davis (H on front). Any backs acceptable. Send scans and prices to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url] 
THANKS to all who helped out the 1st time around!
Here's some commons more I could use: Fred Merkle (portrait & throwing), Frank Smith (white cap), Art Devlin, Lee Tannehill (with L), Johnny Bates, Nap Rucker (portrait), George Stovall, George Stone, Mickey Doolin (portrait), Lefty Leifield (batting & pitching), Hooks Wiltse (portrait with & without cap), Charlie Starr, Charlie Hemphill, Bob Ewing, Harry Lord, George McQuillan (ball in hand), Bobby Byrne, Joe Dunn, Red Dooin, Bill Clancy, Jimmy Slagle, George Schirm.
I would like to add these Hof'ers but budget limitations may not allow it:
Portraits- Bender, Chesbro, Waddell, Keeler, Jennings, Willis, Wallace, Griffith & Beckley
Non Portraits- Joss (pitching), Clarke (with bat), Wheat, McGinnity & McGraw (finger in air)
All HOF'ers: probably SGC 40's, no creases.
E-mail sent RE: T206 SGC50s VG-EX

I have a PSA5 Fiene El Principe de Gales on my web site if you're interested.  Here is the link:

[url]http://imageevent.com/brailey/cardsforsale[/url]
